00014 /*
00015  * This is a list of all built-in formals accepted by Imperas simulators.
00016  *
00017  */
00018 
00019 #ifndef OPF_FORMALS_H
00020 #define OPF_FORMALS_H
00021 
00023 // Parameters applicable to a processor instance
00025 
00026 /* If the processor is not connected to a bus, use this number of address bits */
00027 #define BIF_ADDR_BITS                  "addrbits"
00028 
00029 /* Set a unique ID for this CPU */
00030 #define BIF_CPU_ID                     "cpuid"
00031 
00032 /* MDP does not not use gdb with this processor */
00033 #define BIF_DEBUG_BASIC                "debugbasic"
00034 
00035 /* This processor will load it's default semihost library */
00036 #define BIF_DEFAULT_SEMIHOST           "defaultsemihost"
00037 
00038 /* Load VAP tools */
00039 #define BIF_ENABLE_TOOLS                "enabletools"
00040 
00041 /* Load VAP tools for PSE*/
00042 #define BIF_ENABLE_TOOLS_PSE            "enabletoolspse"
00043 
00044 /* Set this processor endian (most processors with selectable endian use this name). */
00045 #define BIF_ENDIAN                     "endian"
00046 
00047 /* specify a file to be a read by a gdb connected to this processor */
00048 #define BIF_GDB_COMMAND_FILE           "gdbcommandfile"
00049 
00050 /* Additional command-line flags for the gdb connected to this processor */
00051 #define BIF_GDB_FLAGS                  "alternategdbflags"
00052 
00053 /* tell gdb to execute this file before the prompt is displayed */
00054 #define BIF_GDB_INIT                   "gdbinit"
00055 
00056 /* override the default path to the gdb connected to this processor */
00057 #define BIF_GDB_PATH                   "alternategdbpath"
00058 
00059 /* The simulator will intercept calls to Imperas special functions */
00060 #define BIF_IMPERAS_INTERCEPTS         "enableimperasintercepts"
00061 
00062 /* VAP tools do SMP analysis */
00063 #define BIF_ENABLE_SMP_TOOLS           "enableSMPTools"
00064 
00065 /* For internal use */
00066 #define BIF_FETCH_VALIDATE             "fetchvalidate"
00067 
00068 /* Use physical rather than virtual addresses when loading application code
00069  * for this processor. */
00070 #define BIF_LOAD_PHYSICAL              "loadphysical"
00071 
00072 /* Use VMA rather than LMA on Elf file loads for this processor */
00073 #define BIF_ELF_USE_VMA                "elfusevma"
00074 
00075 /* limit the maximum number of instructions to be executed */
00076 #define BIF_MAX_INSTRUCTIONS           "maxinstructions"
00077 
00078 /* specify the MIPS rate of this processor (in MHz) */
00079 #define BIF_MIPS                       "mips"
00080 
00081 /* Pass flags a 32-bit word of flags to this model.
00082  * (The model must be coded to accept it). */
00083 #define BIF_MODEL_FLAGS                "debugflags"
00084 
00085 /* When a processor exception is encountered, the processor will execute the
00086  * exception rather than stopping the simulation */
00087 #define BIF_SIMEX                      "simulateexceptions"
00088 
00089 /* Ignore the start address in the hardware or the loaded application,
00090  * and start at this specified address instead. */
00091 #define BIF_START_ADDRESS              "startaddress"
00092 
00093 /* Enable instruction tracing */
00094 #define BIF_TRACE                      "trace"
00095 
00096 /* For internal use */
00097 #define BIF_TRACE_NO_ANNUL             "tracenoannul"
00098 
00099 /* Turn on the trace history buffer */
00100 #define BIF_TRACE_BUFFER               "tracebuffer"
00101 
00102 /* Turn on the trace of register changes */
00103 #define BIF_TRACE_CHANGE               "tracechange"
00104 
00105 /* Turn off tracing after this many instructions */
00106 #define BIF_TRACE_COUNT                "tracecount"
00107 
00108 /* Include a per-processor instruction count in the trace output */
00109 #define BIF_TRACE_SHOW_ICOUNT          "traceshowicount"
00110 
00111 /* Turn tracing on after this many instructions */
00112 #define BIF_TRACE_START                "tracestart"
00113 
00114 /* Print processor register contents after each instruction */
00115 #define BIF_TRACE_REGS_AFTER           "traceregsafter"
00116 
00117 /* Print processor register contents before each instruction */
00118 #define BIF_TRACE_REGS_BEFORE          "traceregsbefore"
00119 
00120 /* Trace memory starting at this address - NOT USED */
00121 #define BIF_TRACE_MEM_ADDR             "tracememaddr"
00122 
00123 /* Trace memory this many bytes - NOT USED  */
00124 #define BIF_TRACE_MEM_SIZE             "tracememsize"
00125 
00126 /* Array of user flags sent to the semihost library to pass to main()  */
00127 #define BIF_USER_ARGV                 "userargv"
00128 
00129 /* Trace memory this many bytes - NOT USED  */
00130 #define BIF_VARIANT                   "variant"
00131 
00133 // Parameters applicable to a peripheral instance
00135 
00136 #define BIF_DIAGS                      "diagnosticlevel"
00137 
00139 // Parameters applicable to a root module
00141 
00142 /* Run the pse constructors before dropping into the debugger */
00143 #define BIF_DEBUG_PSE_CONSTRUCTORS     "debugpseconstructors"
00144 
00145 /* Debug TCL Batch Files (separated by semicolons) */
00146 #define BIF_DEBUG_BATCH_FILE           "batch"
00147 
00148 /* Debug MI Mode */
00149 #define BIF_DEBUG_MI_MODE              "mi"
00150 
00151 /* Debug TCL Mode (After any batch files) */
00152 #define BIF_DEBUG_TCL_MODE             "interactive"
00153 
00154 /* Debug GDB Mode (After any batch files) */
00155 #define BIF_DEBUG_GDB_MODE             "idebug"
00156 
00157 /* Run in IGEN or CPUGEN modes */
00158 #define BIF_CGEN                       "cgen"
00159 #define BIF_IGEN                       "igen"
00160 #define BIF_ISS                        "iss"
00161 
00162 /* Override default dictionary size */
00163 #define BIF_DICT_SIZE                  "dictsize"
00164 
00165 /* Options for GDB and MP GUI */
00166 #define BIF_EGUI_OPTIONS                "eguioptions"
00167 
00168 /* Set the simulation finish time */
00169 #define BIF_FINISH_TIME                "finishtime"
00170 
00171 /* 'pop-up' a GDB console */
00172 #define BIF_GDB_CONSOLE                "gdbconsole"
00173 
00174 /* Start GDB EGUI */
00175 #define BIF_GDB_EGUI                   "gdbegui"
00176 
00177 /* Start GDB GUI */
00178 #define BIF_GDB_GUI                    "gdbgui"
00179 
00180 /* 'pop-up' a multiprocessor debug console */
00181 #define BIF_MPD_CONSOLE                "mpdconsole"
00182 
00183 /* Start MPD EGUI */
00184 #define BIF_MPD_EGUI                   "mpdegui"
00185 
00186 /* Start MPD GUI */
00187 #define BIF_MPD_GUI                    "mpdgui"
00188 
00189 /* 'pop-up' a multiprocessor debug console */
00190 #define BIF_MPD_FULL_NAMES             "mpdfullnames"
00191 
00192 /* Listen for but do not wait for a debugger connection */
00193 #define BIF_NO_RSP_WAIT                "rspnowait"
00194 
00195 /* for internal use only */
00196 #define BIF_NO_SIMULATION              "nosimulation"
00197 
00198 /* Enable limited parallel simulation */
00199 #define BIF_NO_OPTIMIZE                "nooptimze"
00200 
00201 /* Enable limited parallel simulation */
00202 #define BIF_PARALLEL                  "parallel"
00203 
00204 /* Enable unlimited parallel simulation */
00205 #define BIF_PARALLEL_MAX              "parallelmax"
00206 
00207 /* Parallel simulation options */
00208 #define BIF_PARALLEL_OPT              "parallelopt"
00209 
00210 /* Set number of parallel threads */
00211 #define BIF_PARALLEL_THREADS          "parallelthreads"
00212 
00213 /* Print all bus connections */
00214 #define BIF_PRINT_BUSES                "showbuses"
00215 
00216 /* Print all available model commands for this platform */
00217 #define BIF_PRINT_COMMANDS             "showcommands"
00218 
00219 /* Print all available model commands for this platform */
00220 #define BIF_PRINT_DOMAINS              "showdomains"
00221 
00222 #define BIF_PRINT_DESIGNS              "showdesigns"
00223 #define BIF_PRINT_MODELS               "showmodels"
00224 #define BIF_PRINT_MODULES              "showmodules"
00225 #define BIF_PRINT_PERIPHERALS          "showperipherals"
00226 #define BIF_PRINT_PLATFORMS            "showplatforms"
00227 #define BIF_PRINT_PROCESSORS           "showprocessors"
00228 
00229 /* Print all environment variable accepted by this product */
00230 #define BIF_PRINT_ENV                  "showenv"
00231 
00232 /* Show all formal parameters in the platform */
00233 #define BIF_PRINT_FORMALS              "showformals"
00234 
00235 /* Show model-specific formal parameters in the platform */
00236 #define BIF_PRINT_MODEL_FORMALS        "showmodelformals"
00237 
00238 /* Show system formal parameters in the platform */
00239 #define BIF_PRINT_SYSTEM_FORMALS       "showsystemformals"
00240 
00241 /* Show all license personality names */
00242 #define BIF_OBJECT_LOADER              "objectloader"
00243 
00244 /* Show all license personality names */
00245 #define BIF_LIST_PERSONALITIES         "listpersonalities"
00246 
00247 /* Show current personality */
00248 #define BIF_PRINT_PERSONALITY          "showpersonality"
00249 
00250 /* set the quantum (in seconds) */
00251 #define BIF_QUANTUM                    "quantum"
00252 
00253 /* Seed for random number generation */
00254 #define BIF_QUANTUM_SEED               "quantumseed"
00255 
00256 /* Output VCD file name for quantum trace */
00257 #define BIF_QUANTUM_TRACE              "quantumtracefile"
00258 
00259 /* Start of quantum in which to search for non-determinism */
00260 #define BIF_QUANTUM_DIFF               "quantumdifftime"
00261 
00262 /* for internal use */
00263 #define BIF_READ_FRAME_INFO            "readframeinfo"
00264 
00265 /* models record to   this directory */
00266 #define BIF_REC_DIR                    "recorddir"
00267 
00268 /* models replay from this directory */
00269 #define BIF_REP_DIR                    "replaydir"
00270 
00271 /* for internal use */
00272 #define BIF_REPORT_MEMORY              "memorystats"
00273 
00274 /* specify and enable a remote debugger port */
00275 #define BIF_REMOTE_DEBUG_PORT          "remotedebugport"
00276 
00277 /* Allow control-C to stop the simulator */
00278 #define BIF_STOP_ON_CTRLC              "stoponcontrolc"
00279 
00280 /* Do not print banners at start and end of simulation
00281  * (restricted to certain products) */
00282 #define BIF_SUPPRESS_BANNER            "suppressbanner"
00283 
00284 /* Notify the simulator that it is encapsulated in SystemC */
00285 #define BIF_SYSTEMC                    "systemc"
00286 
00287 /* Set the simulator time precision */
00288 #define BIF_TIME_PRECISION             "timeprecision"
00289 
00290 /* Enable tracing of simulator shared data */
00291 #define BIF_TRACE_SHARED_DATA          "traceshareddata"
00292 
00293 /* Enable verbose mode. The simulator will print more information */
00294 #define BIF_VERBOSE                    "verbose"
00295 
00296 /* for internal use */
00297 #define BIF_VERBOSE_DICT               "verbosedictionary"
00298 
00299 /* set the simulator wallclock factor to 1.0 */
00300 #define BIF_WALLCLOCK                  "wallclock"
00301 
00302 /* Specify a simulator wallclock factor */
00303 #define BIF_WALLCLOCK_FACTOR           "wallclockfactor"

00310 #define BIF_TRANSPARENT                "transparent"
